Literature.Author: Ramata-Stunda A, Boroduskis M, Kaktina E, Patetko L, Kalnenieks U, Lasa Z, Rubina M, Strazdina I, Kalnins G, Rutkis R. 2023
Literature.Title: Comparative Evaluation of Existing and Rationally Designed Novel Antimicrobial Peptides for Treatment of Skin and Soft Tissue Infections

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (50%) toOH-OM6F: 35%; K: 39%; A: 17%.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 8.0 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 8.0 ug/ml), K. pneumonia (MIC 4.0 ug/ml), E. faecium (MIC 16.0 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 8.0 ug/ml), and C. acnes (MIC 2.0 ug/ml).
